ctx: Naročila v Nemčiji decembra zrasla za skoraj devet odstotkov
content:
Zadnja sprememba: crt 06.02.2024 09:54
In January, 36.9% of manufacturing companies reported a lack of
orders, in Germany, up from 36.0% in October, according to Ifo's
surveys and Reuters.

A year ago, the proportion was just 20.9%.

In the service sector, 32.1% of the companies reported a lack of
orders in January.


www.reuters.com/mark...024-02-05/
author: crt
